postProcess

protected void postProcess(Action obj)
Description copied from class: BaseBuilder
A subclass can post process the component instance after built by the base but before it is returned by BaseBuilder.build(). Commonly used if the builder is adding something to the component as it will typically maintain the list itself and then add the values in BaseBuilder.postProcess(Object).

Overrides:
postProcess in class BaseBuilder<Action>
Parameters:
obj - the newly created component object instance, cannot be null. the component object, never null.

validate

protected void validate(Action obj)
Description copied from class: BaseBuilder
Allows validation to occur on the built component object instance. This is called after the object is built and after BaseBuilder.postProcess(Object) is called but before the component is returned by BaseBuilder.build().

Overrides:
validate in class BaseBuilder<Action>
Parameters:
obj - obj the newly created component object instance, cannot be null. the component object, never null.

createInstance

protected Action createInstance()
Description copied from class: BaseBuilder
The subclass must implement this method and return an instance of the component type specified by the return type.

Specified by:
createInstance in class BaseBuilder<Action>
Returns:
never null.
